document_data.name: ''Staff of Surprises''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of surprises''''' was a [[magic]]al [[staff]] that had several wondrous powers.
document_data.Powers:
A [[command word]] was needed to activate any power of the staff. Each activated power could be deactivated by uttering the command word in reverse.

A ''staff of surprises'' could sprout  a blade from either end. The entire staff could also be extended up to {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} to serve as an extremely long [[pike]] or other long pole. Programmed sounds or small phrases could be stored within the staff and activated. Such messages could last for up to 7 seconds or carry a maximum of 15 spoken words. The staff could also activate a programmed man-sized [[illusion]].
document_data.History: The ''staff of surprises'' originated in [[Myth Drannor]].
